name: Crazy Hill Speed Taxi Driving 3D
description:
Get ready for exciting adventure of Hill Station Taxi driving experience!!

Winter is coming & peoples are ready to visit hill station to spend vocations from schools. So be read to earn some extra money by drooping passengers on distant hilly places. You are on a duty to Drive Super Taxi and pickup the passenger from hill stations; those peoples who stuck in snow. But the challenges don't stop there! You also have to drop them to safe areas & earn handsome amount of money.

To driver Taxi on hill stations is not an easy task at all! You have to make wise moves to earn extra money & explore hilly areas! Steep roads covered with snow with sharp turns lie ahead of you, and too much speed along with offhand driving could be lethal for you and your passengers! Caution must be exercised at all the time.

Crazy Hill Speed Taxi Driving 3D Features:
• Amusing Visual and vibrant Sounds Effects
• Winter Season Simulation with amazing environment.
• Splendid Variety of Taxi's to choose from.
• Realistic Animated peoples for pick & drop.
• Thrilling Precision Taxi Driving Experience.
• Smooth easy & addictive gameplay.

Download the best Crazy Hill Station Taxi Parking Game now!!
